            #include <bits/stdc++.h>

                vector<int> val;

                    dfs(v, u);

                    dp[u] = 0;
                } else {
                    for (int i=0; i<val.size()-1; i++) {
                        deg[u] = max(deg[u], val[i]);
                    }
                    dp[u] = val.back() + 1;
                }
            }
